title: Gandalf, The White Wizard (T) (4C90T)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers

Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Companion • Wizard
Strength:	7

Game Text:	While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +3.

Notes:	Tengwar
